subreddits.title: Subreddits to scrape
subreddits.description: List of subreddit names (without r/ prefix). Example: cscareerquestions, ExperiencedDevs

postsPerSubreddit.title: Posts per subreddit
postsPerSubreddit.description: Number of posts to scrape from each subreddit

sortBy.title: Sort order
sortBy.description: How to sort posts in each subreddit

includeComments.title: Include comments
includeComments.description: Fetch top comments for each post (recommended for better metadata extraction)

maxCommentsPerPost.title: Max comments per post
maxCommentsPerPost.description: Number of top-level comments to fetch per post

filterInterviewOnly.title: Filter interview posts only
filterInterviewOnly.description: Only scrape posts that appear to be about interviews (contains keywords: interview, offer, reject, etc.)

minWordCount.title: Minimum word count
minWordCount.description: Skip posts with body text shorter than this (helps filter low-quality posts)
